description: Kamor leather case closely fit for 9.7 inch Android Tablets with internal keyboard and Micro USB cable (with mini adapter). Simply open its magnetic induction hasp, lay your tablet on the panel, pull open the holder outside, connect USB cable, and then it's time for you to enjoy your keyboard input with comfort and casualness.Advice Compatible Models:Dragon Touch A97 9.7'' Google Android 4.2 Jelly Bean Dual Core  /  Quad Core Retina Screen TabletHP TouchPad Wi-Fi 16 GB / 32 GB 9.7-Inch TabletCoby Kyros 9.7-Inch Android 4.0 8 GB Internet Tablet 4:39.7" Android 4.0 8 GB Trio Stealth Pro Internet TabletArchos 97 Carbon 9.7-Inch 16 GB TabletLenovo Idea Tablet S2109 9.7-Inch 16 GB TabletBLU Touch Book 9.7 Black WiFi Android Touchscreen Unlocked TabletAluratek Cinepad AT197F 9.7-Inch 4GB TabletiDeaUSA 9.7" Android 4.1 Jelly Bean Tablet2014 New iRulu 9.7" Quad-Core 4X1.2GHz Android TabletIf accidently this keyboard not work with one of these tablets above, plese always feel free to contact us first before leaving feedback / review. We will strive to fix the issue to your full satisfaction. Guaranteed!WILL NOT WORK WITH:Apple iPad Air / iPad 5 / iPad 1 2 3 4Note:This keyboard is only compatible with Windows and Android system, Before releasing your order, please check with your tablet seller to sure that your tablet must support external keyboard (have OTG support). You can try to use USB-storage to connect to your Tablet PC, if available, it also can work with this item.
title: Kamor® 9.7" PU Leather Stand Case + Micro USB Keyboard with Touch Screen Stylus Pen for 9.7 inch Android Tablet PC + Micro Female to Mini Male adapter (Black)
